name: bart-departures
title: BART Departures
description: Check BART departures from your favorite station
author: quacksire

commands.name: departures
commands.title: BART Departures
commands.subtitle: Show BART depatures from a given station
commands.description: Get the next BART departures from a given station

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
